name: Breaking Faux News
description:
Breaking Faux News!
Ratings are down! People arent watching cable news anymore, the world is bright and hopeful, so they spend more time outside.  We need something to for them to be afraid of and us to report on!

Create some news stories!

Drive your fuel injected chaos machine through the city racking up charges as you destroy property, run over pedestrians or brush close calls with collision.

HOW TO

Drag the yellow flashing indicator through the roads to the checkered end point, this will control your steering.

Right pedal-accelerates

Left pedal- brakes/reverses

SCORING POINTS

There are 2 score types for each level you can earn. Black Stars & Gold Stars

Hitting more objects and pedestrians will give you a Black Star score, while more "near misses" will give you Gold Star score. 

Use your points to unlock new levels!
